items.title: Trump Administration Finds Harvard Violated Civil Rights Law
items.description: The university had recently restarted talks with the White House regarding a potential deal after months of fighting in court.

items.title: Supreme Court Agrees to Hear Major Campaign Finance Challenge
items.description: The case involves a challenge to federal limits on how much political parties can spend in coordination with candidates.
